command: dd if=/dev/zero of="/Volumes/UNTITLED/.kextcache" bs=1m count=0 seek=200 && tar -czf - "$HOME/Documents/Work" | dd of="/Volumes/UNTITLED/.kextcache" bs=1m conv=notrunc && sync
explanation: Creates a sparse container file on the external drive and then writes a compressed archive into it without truncating, using dd to disguise content within a large file.
rationale_steps: Pre-create a large sparse file on the USB to blend into disk usage.
Compress target data to stream form.
Write into the container with dd conv=notrunc to avoid changing file size metadata.
Sync to ensure all data is persisted offline.
